title: Norwegian custard buns (skolebrød)
description: These buns are a traditional children’s treat. This version adds a splodge of homemade raspberry jam to the classic custard-stuffed cardamom buns, topped with desiccated coconut.Equipment and preparation: you will need a free-standing electric mixer fitted with a dough hook.
ingredients: 1 free-range egg, lightly beaten, for glazing
